item.title: Sales Insights
item.description: Problem Statement : The sales of a given company/firm is declining, we have to create a dashboard to track its progress or regress, answer some important questions also we have to find insights from the data so that the declining of the sales can be reduced. Applied ETL process to extract data from SQL database and then transformed data in Power Query and then load the data in power bi to create the report

item.title: The Witcher Project
item.description: It is a NLP project in which I’ve tried to find the relationship among different characters of a book with the help of natural language processing Firstly the name of the characters are scraped from https://witcher.fandom.com/wiki/Witcher_Wiki with the help of Selenium so that we can separate the name of the characters from the other text data of the book Then with the help of spacy we find the relationships among the characters and then with the help of networkx we have created network graphs that shows the relationship among the characters

item.title: Movie Recommendation System
item.description: Created a recommendation tool that will help users to find the most relevant movies Applied NLP techniques for the cleaning process of dataset Applied EDA on the cleaned dataset to find interesting relationships and facts from the dataset Applied techniques to convert text data into numerical data Used similarity measure for the recommendation of movies Deployed the app on Streamlit with the help of Git and GitHub Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: SMS Spam Classification
item.description: Created a classification tool that will help users to distinguish between Ham and Spam Applied EDA on the dataset to find interesting relationships and facts from the dataset Applied NLP techniques to clean the text data Used different methods to convert text data into numerical data Applied different machine learning algorithms to find the best algorithm that generalizes well on training and testing data Used accuracy and precision metrices for the selection of best algorithm
